abstract.p: Beachfront Cloister on Sea Island, Ga, is offering summer savings from August 15 to September 26; drawing (S)

block.p: GEORGIA SAVINGS -- The beachfront Cloister on Sea Island, Ga., is offering summer rates from Aug. 15 to Sept. 26 of $204 a person a night, double occupancy. Guests receive the best room available at check-in, so savings can range from $50 to $200 a night. The rate is good Sunday through Wednesday and includes three meals a day. Guests under 19 sharing a room with their parents stay and eat free. Through Labor Day, parents can enjoy free time while children ages 3 through 12 partake of the Junior Staff program, which includes field trips, tennis lessons and other activities. Golfers can also get unlimited greens fees at three courses with cart and range balls for $113 a day; one course requires hiring a caddie, at an extra charge. For information and reservations, contact (800) 732-4752.

YELLOWSTONE AUTUMN -- The National Park Lodges in Yellowstone are offering a series of autumn specials for those who book online at www.travelyellowstone .com. The room rates at the lodges, operated by Amfac Parks and Resorts, have been reduced by an average of 35 percent. At the Lake Yellowstone Hotel, a premium room is $99 Oct. 1 to 5; the Old Faithful Snow Lodge has a Lodge room for the same price Oct. 8 to 14. At Grant Village, a midrange room is $69 and a high-range room $79 from Sept. 24 to 30. From Oct. 1 to 9 at the Mammoth Hot Springs Hotel, a room with shared bath is $25, a room with private bath is $59 and a suite is $149.

FERRY BARGAINS -- For self-drive tours of the Inside Passage along the British Columbia coast, the fall may be the time to go. BC Ferries is offering a discounted transportation and accommodations package for its 15-hour cruises from Port Hardy to Prince Rupert from Sept. 17 through Oct. 14. The daylight voyages offer views of snowcapped mountains, forested hills, fjords and sheltered coastal villages. Prices start at $170 a person, double occupancy, and include one-way passage for one car and two adults and two nights' lodging at a choice of 19 motels and hotels near BC Ferries ports. Rates represent a 20 percent discount in ferry fares and up to 40 percent off the peak rates for lodging. To book, call (800) 435-5622.

EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL -- For guests who don't mind helping a new resort work the kinks out, there's the Debut Getaway at the Ocean Villas, a new addition to the Westin Rio Mar Beach on Puerto Rico. From the scheduled opening date of Oct. 1 through Dec. 21, two-bedroom oceanfront villas (accommodating up to six people) will cost $2,000 for four nights if guests arrive Saturday through Wednesday; guests arriving Thursday or Friday pay the same price for three nights. It includes two rounds of golf per villa at the resort's two courses, two hours of tennis and $200 in food credits. The potential saving is about $1,000. Taxes are included and the offer is subject to availability. Call (800) 937-8461.
